title: Do S Obake ga Nekasete Kurenai
original_name: ド S おばけが寝かせてくれない
sinopse:
Yuuji falls for his coworker and receives a wedding invite from him. He drowns his sorrows then goes to bed frustrated. During the night, he gets haunted by a sexual ghost. The next night, the ghost appears again and it seems that the ghost is interested in him.

(Source: Yaoi Sekai Scanlations)
